name: gamegirl-selfies
description: Port of camera from 81.ada.is to a seperate app.

scripts.build:scripts: mkdir -p scripts && rollup -i ./_scripts/main.js -o ./scripts/main.js -c -m && cd scripts && uglifyjs --source-map main.min.js.map -m --screw-ie8 main.js -o main.min.js && wc -c main.min.js
scripts.watch: ./parallel.sh "nodemon --watch ./_scripts -e js --exec npm run build:js" "nodemon --watch ./client -e css,html,png,json --exec npm run build:other"

author: Ada Rose Edwards
